description: Miles is a high-ranking female member of the Comodeen. She`s tanned and has purple hair. She`s a tough girl and helps Ai change her clothes the 1st time they meet each other. She`s usually seen carrying out the attacks for the Comodeen. She also seems to have a crush on Cid, who kissed her when he is turned into a frog and was transformed back. Since then, she gets very flustered and happy whenever Cid talks to her.
name: Miles
